Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You could.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SnowfireL@... 
  To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 4:58 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV






  Well, if I one da=
y have no shoes, had to live on the street (God Forbid), and could not even=
 take a shower, I would stand in the line a mile long hoping to get a bed f=
or the night with all the other poor people, I wonder if I could get a job,=
 and find my way out of a mess without anyone else's help, I wonder if I co=
uld do that all by myself.  I really doubt it, people need people, like tha=
t one ghost lady said, that recording really tells all.

  In a message dat=
ed 5/27/2009 6:29:46 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, april@abercrombieghostrese=
arch.com writes:




    The only way I would ever "help" a ghost is by tel=
ling it that it has the power to find a way out the predicament itself.

  =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Steve Hill 
      To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 4:18 PM
      Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV



      We all have our o=
wn beliefs. I make no judgements on the living or the dead. I just communic=
ate and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. Many,many spirits have asked =
me for help. If they can help themselves, they do not seem to know how. The=
 prisoners believe that they would be trapped. if they died there. Are they=
 imprisoned by their own beliefs?
      Steve




-------------------------=
-------------------------------------------------
      From: April Abercro=
mbie <april@...>
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=

      Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:58:19 PM
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=
] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV



      In a way, I agree. "Stuck" impl=
ies accidental. If a ghost is hanging around, it there by choice, whether i=
t is fully aware of that or not.

        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
     From: Frank Sumption 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
        Se=
nt: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 3:55 PM
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Bo=
x Demo at Moundsville WV



         I don't believe in trapped/lost souls,=
 I think that's Hollywood. The trouble with doing investigations, I think, =
is you get the evidence you expect to get, so it will tend to support the c=
oncept of stuck souls. When I record it supports my concept of sprits trave=
l, and hauntings are for show. Which is correct?--both at one time or anoth=
er. 

         I did a recording at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice =
says "ghost--right behind you". I was recording open air with the test boar=
d running.  

         Frank-S


        On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <=
SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:





          Well, stand outside the thing, an=
d help those poor souls out, here they are making money at the cost of lost=
 souls who are asking for help.  Shame on them, don't they realize  how man=
y lost souls there are out there, waiting, go back (a few thousand years wo=
rth of them,)  were I to name all the tribes, country, religions, throughou=
t the years, people that died trapped, in various places over century's, an=
d yes there are thousand's of them in the world, just dwelling in a cell of=
 their own making, no progression, no light, no hope, without people they l=
ove, and who wait still loving them, they exist in these dark places withou=
t God.  This mission should be to help them get back to God, back to the li=
ght of God, light of Universe however, we want to call it, but in that ligh=
t is love and happiness.  Just my take, sf

          In a message dated 5/=
27/2009 3:42:33 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com wri=
tes:




            Yes, you need special permission. I was there for an a=
ll night ghost hunt as a guest of Eastern Paranormal. The place can be rent=
ed at night but believe me when I say "it ain't cheap". Plus I don't think =
the prison would appreciate me releasing the inmates before their eternal s=
entence has been served..
            Steve




---------------------------=
-----------------------------------------
            From: "SnowfireL@aol.=
 com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

     =
       Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 2:31:57 PM 

            Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




            Does one need sp=
ecial permission to get in there?  You folks should go back, and release th=
em since a few of them already know you Steve, this is Steve?  Right?  sf

=
            In a message dated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M.. Eastern Daylight Tim=
e, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




              Unfortunately I di=
d not get to attempt to cross them. After my demonstration, another group t=
hat was also there started complaining that the box made too much noise and=
 was hendering their investigation so I turned it off. I wouldn't want my d=
irect communication with the deceased inmates to mess up their EVP work, no=
w would I? I apoligized and put it away for the rest of the night.
        =
       According to the prison staff, the inmates firmly believed that if t=
hey died in prison their souls would be forever trapped there. This belief =
was so strong that the prison officials would take the elderly inmates who =
were dying of natural causes to a local hospital so they would'nt have to d=
ie in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were well founded.     




---------=
---------------------------------------------------------
              Fro=
m: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

              To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups .com

              Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 12:36:12 PM 

  =
            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




   =
           This is a wonderful recording, were you able to free any of them=
?  So sad to see them still there behind bars, must be very lonely for them=
, they should be moving on so, they can start to work on making up for thin=
gs on the other side.  You folks should go up there again, and hold a small=
 prayer vigil for them, of course they would no longer be ghosts trapped th=
ere, but there are plenty more around. sf

              In a message dated=
 5/27/2009 12:10:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com=
 writes:



                I was invited to spend the night in the West Vi=
rginia Penitentiary this past weekend... I was asked to give a short demons=
tration with my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside the prison surroun=
ded by concrete and steel, the radio could not pick up any radio stations i=
n manual mode. I wasn't sure how this might effect the demonstration. I was=
 pleasantly surprised with the results. I recorded the session and the resu=
lts can be heard at this link. http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=3DKwDYu4RUL=
lk
